data.name: Bootstrapper.AutoUpdateFailed
data.value: Bloxstrap was unable to auto-update to {0}. Please update it manually by downloading and running the latest release from the GitHub page.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Connectivity.Preventing
data.value: It's possible that something is preventing Bloxstrap from connecting to the internet. Please check and try again.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Connectivity.RobloxDown
data.value: Roblox may be down right now. See status.roblox.com for more information. Please try again later.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Connectivity.TimedOut
data.value: Bloxstrap timed out when trying to connect to three different Roblox deployment mirrors, indicating a poor internet connection. Please try again later.

data.name: Bootstrapper.EmojiPresetFetchFailed
data.value: Could not apply the {0} emoji mod preset because of a network error. To try again, please reconfigure the option in the Bloxstrap Menu.

data.name: Bootstrapper.FirstRunUninstall
data.value: You must first install Bloxstrap before uninstalling.

data.name: Bootstrapper.HyperionUpdateInfo
data.value:
Roblox has now finished rolling out the new game client update, featuring 64-bit support and the Hyperion anticheat. ReShade does not work with this update, and so it has now been disabled and removed from Bloxstrap.
Your ReShade configuration files will still be saved, and you can locate them by opening the folder where Bloxstrap is installed to, and navigating to the Integrations folder. You can choose to delete these if you want.

data.name: Bootstrapper.NotEnoughSpace
data.value: Bloxstrap does not have enough disk space to download and install Roblox. Please free up some disk space and try again.

data.name: Bootstrapper.RanInAdminMode
data.value: Bloxstrap does not support running in administrator mode. Relaunch or reinstall Bloxstrap with lower privileges.

data.name: Bootstrapper.StylePreview.ImageCancel
data.value: Style preview - Click the X button at the top right to close
data.comment: Text for style previews that use an X button. Currently only applies to Byfron

data.name: Bootstrapper.StylePreview.TextCancel
data.value: Style preview - Click Cancel to close
data.comment: Text for style previews that use text button that says "Cancel"

data.name: Bootstrapper.Uninstall.RobloxRunning
data.value: Roblox is currently running, but must be closed before uninstalling Bloxstrap. Would you like close Roblox now?

data.name: Bootstrapper.WMFNotFound
data.value: Roblox requires the use of Windows Media Foundation components. You appear to be missing them, likely because you are using an N edition of Windows. Please install them first, and then launch Roblox.

data.name: ContextMenu.CloseRobloxMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to close Roblox? This will forcefully end the process.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.UnableToConnect
data.value: Bloxstrap is unable to connect to {0}

data.name: Dialog.Exception.Info.1
data.value: An exception occurred while running Bloxstrap

data.name: Dialog.Exception.Info.2
data.value: Please report this exception through a GitHub issue or in our Discord chat, along with a copy of the log file that was created.

data.name: InstallChecker.DriveLetterChangeDetected
data.value:
Bloxstrap has detected a drive letter change and has reconfigured its install location from the {0} drive to the {1} drive.
While Bloxstrap will continue to work, it's recommended that you change the drive letter back to its original value as other installed applications can experience similar issues.

data.name: InstallChecker.InstallDriveMissing
data.value: Bloxstrap was originally installed to the {0} drive, but it appears to no longer be present. Would you like to continue and carry out a fresh install?

data.name: InstallChecker.NotInstalledProperly
data.value: It appears as if Bloxstrap hasn't been properly installed. Is it supposed to be installed at {0}?

data.name: InstallChecker.SeeWhatsNew
data.value: See what's new in this version

data.name: InstallChecker.Updated
data.value: Bloxstrap has been upgraded to v{0}

data.name: InstallChecker.VersionDifferentThanInstalled
data.value: The version of Bloxstrap you've launched is different to the version you currently have installed. Would you like to upgrade your currently installed version?

data.name: Menu.About.Contributors.Description
data.value: These are the people who have made notable contributions to Bloxstrap, helping make it what it is.

data.name: Menu.About.Description
data.value: An alternative bootstrapper for Roblox with a bunch of extra features.

data.name: Menu.About.UnreleasedVersion
data.value: Using an unreleased version, I see?

data.name: Menu.AlreadyRunning.Caption
data.value: Please note that not all your changes will immediately apply until you close all currently open Roblox instances.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Bootstrapper.Description
data.value: You can make it look different, retro, or even just like Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.CustomisationIcon.Description
data.value: Must be a multi-size .ico file with sizes 16px to 128px. Set Icon as 'Custom' to use it.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.CustomisationTitle.Description
data.value: The text that shows as the title of the bootstrapper.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Icon.Description
data.value: Choose what icon it should use.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Style.Description
data.value: Choose how it should look. Dark theme does not apply to Legacy/Vista.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.AutoUpdate.Description
data.value: Bloxstrap will automatically check and update itself when launching Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.CreateDesktopIcon.Description
data.value: Bloxstrap will place an icon on the desktop that launches Roblox the next time it launches.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.Description
data.value: Configure what Bloxstrap should do when launching.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ForceRobloxReinstall.Description
data.value: Roblox will be installed fresh on next launch.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.AlreadyExists
data.value: An entry for this flag name already exists.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.BannerText
data.value: Misusing this can lead to instability or unexpected things happening.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.ConflictingImport
Menu.FastFlagEditor.Description
data.value: Manage your own FastFlags. Double click a column to edit.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidCharacter
data.value: The name of this flag is not valid as names can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidJSON
Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidPrefix
data.value: The name of this flag is not valid as names must start with FFlag, DFInt, etc

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.LargeConfig
data.value:
You appear to be importing a very large configuration. You should only be importing configurations that you fully understand. Do NOT blindly paste in configurations made by other people. If you continue, you will very likely end up with stability issues and encounter unexpected changes.
Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.Warning.Header
data.value: Do you know what you are doing?

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.Warning.Text
data.value:
Fast Flags are extremely powerful, being that they are intended to only be used by Roblox engineers. While they can be very useful, manually configuring them can cause serious issues with stability and functionality. Do NOT use the editor if you are unsure of what you are doing.
Do NOT use this to import large "flag lists" made by other people that promise to improve performance or such. They are subject to the aforementioned issues, and they will cause problems for you since you will not be fully aware of what they are changing. If you were about to do that, GO BACK.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Description
data.value: Control how specific Roblox engine parameters and features are configured.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Editor.Description
data.value: Manage your own Fast Flags. Use with caution.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Help.Description
data.value: Learn more about Fast Flags, what these presets do, and how to use them.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.AltGraphicsSelector.Description
data.value: Toggle between using the consolidated 1-10 / fine-grained 1-21 graphics quality slider.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.D3DExclusiveFullscreenInfo
data.value: FastFlag preset for Direct3D [exclusive fullscreen]({0}) using Alt+Enter is already enabled by default.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Debug.FlagStateOverlay.Description
data.value: Show values of specified flags during runtime. Each flag is comma separated.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Debug.HttpProxyAddress.Description
data.value: Set blank if not using a proxy. Don't forget to add cacert.pem as a mod.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.EscapeMenuVersion.Description
data.value: Choose which version of the escape menu to use.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FixDisplayScaling.Description
data.value: Roblox reduces your rendering quality, depending on display scaling. This toggle disables that.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FixDisplayScaling.Title
data.value: Preserve rendering quality with display scaling

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FPSLimit.Description
data.value: Use a large number like 9999 for no limit. Set as 0 for defaults.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.HideGuis.Description
data.value: Toggled with [keyboard shortcuts]({0}). Only works if you're in the [Bloxstrap group]({1}).

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.LightingTechnology.Description
data.value: Choose which lighting technology should be forced enabled in all games.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Materials.Description
data.value: Choose which material version should be forced in all games.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RenderingMode.Description
data.value: Choose what renderer Roblox should use. VR requires Direct3D/Automatic.

data.name: Menu.Installation.InstallLocation.Description
data.value: Choose where Bloxstrap should be installed to.

data.name: Menu.Installation.OpenInstallFolder.Description
data.value: Where Bloxstrap is currently installed to.

data.name: Menu.Installation.UninstallGuide.Description
data.value: Here's a guide on how to uninstall Bloxstrap.

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.CantInstall
data.value: Bloxstrap cannot be installed here. Please choose a different location, or resort to using the default location by clicking the reset button.

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.NotEmpty
Menu.InstallLocation.NotSet
data.value: You must set an install location

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.NoWritePerms
data.value: Bloxstrap does not have write access to the install location you've selected. Please choose another location.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.AllowActivityJoining.Description
data.value: Allows for anybody to join the game you're currently in through your Discord profile.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Custom.Description
data.value: Here, you can have other programs launch with Roblox automatically.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Custom.NoneSelected
data.value: No integration selected, please select or add a new one

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Description
data.value: Configure quick and easy ways to improve the Roblox gameplay experience.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.DesktopApp.Description
data.value: Roblox will fully close when you leave a game instead of dropping you back into the app.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.EnableActivityTracking.Description
data.value: Allows for Bloxstrap to detect what Roblox game you're playing. Certain features may require this.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.RequiresActivityTracking
data.value: This feature requires activity tracking to be enabled.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.ShowGameActivity.Description
data.value: When playing a Roblox game, the game you're playing will show on your Discord profile activity.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.ShowServerDetails.Description
data.value: When you join a game, you'll be notified of where your server's located. Won't show in fullscreen.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.ShowServerDetails.Title
data.value: See server location when joining a game

data.name: Menu.Mods.Description
data.value: Manage and apply file mods to the Roblox game client.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Help.Description
data.value: See info about managing and creating mods.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CustomFont.Description
data.value: Forces every in-game font to be a font that you choose.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CustomFont.Invalid
data.value: The file you have chosen does not appear to be a valid font file.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.DisableFullscreenOptimisations.Description
data.value: A Windows feature that may conflict with performance in full-screen.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.EmojiType.Description
data.value: Choose which type of emoji should Roblox use.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.MouseCursor.Description
data.value: Choose between using two classic Roblox cursor styles.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldAvatarEditor.Description
data.value: Bring back the old avatar editor background used in the Roblox app prior to 2020.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldCharacterSounds.Description
data.value: An attempt to roughly bring back the character sounds used prior to 2014.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldDeathSound.Description
data.value: Bring back the classic 'oof' death sound.

data.name: Menu.MoreInfo
data.value: Click for more information on this option.

data.name: Menu.PreInstall.Description
data.value: There's just a few things you first should know about.

data.name: Menu.PreInstall.Info.1
data.value: After installation has finished, the Bloxstrap Menu will be registered as an application in the Start menu. If you ever need to access it again to re-adjust your settings, or access resources such as FastFlag management, you can find it there.

data.name: Menu.PreInstall.Info.2
data.value: If you ever need help or guidance with anything, be sure to check the [Wiki]({0}). If you still need something, open an [issue]({1}) on GitHub, or join our [Discord server]({2}).

data.name: Menu.SettingsSaved.Message
data.value: Changes will take effect the next time you launch Roblox.
